Minobu lies roughly in the centre of the aptly named
(身延線), a single tracked JR rail line. Local trains regularly run on this line between
to the south. Express trains also run several times a day between Kofu and

.
This line is operated by JR Central and most stations are unmanned with a one man car system in operation.
There are regular bus services connecting Minobu with Shinjuku and many bus tours are operated to the town.

The Minobu line has several stations within the boundaries of the town with few inhabited locations lying far from the railway line/Fuji river. Bus services connecting Minobu station with Minobu temple are quite regular and timed to conincide with train arrivals.
is the standard omiyage of Minobu.
